meanings: send out scouts to see what the enemy is up to

examples.korean: When sorrows come, they come not single spies, but in battalion. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 불행이 올 때는 척후병처럼 하나씩 오는 것이 아니라 한꺼번에 온다(cf. Shak., Hamlet). Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: When sorrows come, they come not single spies, but in battalion. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Knowing the danger, the scout was unceasingly vigilant. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 위험을 알고 있었으므로, 척후병은 끊임없이 조심스럽게 살펴 지키고 있었다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: Knowing the danger, the scout was unceasingly vigilant. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: string out scouts along the road 듣기 Add to Wordbook 척후병을 연도에 배치하다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: string out scouts along the road Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Any refugees that make it back to the fort will arm themselves and become Skirmishers to help defend the colony. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 피난민은 요새에 도착하면 스스로 무장하여 척후병이 되며 식민지 방어에 도움을 줍니다. hansemEUG
examples.english: Any refugees that make it back to the fort will arm themselves and become Skirmishers to help defend the colony. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Coureur, Skirmisher and Native Warrior hitpoints increased. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 쿠뤼어, 척후병 및 원주민 전사의 체력이 높아집니다. hansemEUG
